name: HometownRadioKBEC
0:
”Alexa, open hometown radio k. b. e. c.”
”Alexa, launch hometown radio k. b. e. c.”
”Alexa, play hometown radio k. b. e. c.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hometown radio k. b. e. c.
des: KBEC plays classic country, talk, and sports shows. To enable our skill, say "Alexa, enable Hometown Radio K. B. E. C. Skill".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
